Euroleague Basketball Teams Data

euroleague_basketball.Rd

A dataset containing information about Euroleague basketball teams, their home cities, arenas, and performance in the competition.

Usage

euroleague_basketball

Format

euroleague_basketball

A data frame with 23 rows and 11 columns:

Team

Name of the basketball team

Home city

City where the team is based

Arena

Name of the team's arena

Capacity

Seating capacity of the arena

Season

The team's performance in the current season

Last season

The team's performance in the last season

Country

Country where the team is located

FinalFour_Appearances

Number of times the team has reached the Euroleague Final Four

Titles_Won

Number of Euroleague titles won by the team

Years_of_FinalFour_Appearances

Years when the team reached the Final Four

Years_of_Titles_Won

Years when the team won the Euroleague title

Source

Data compiled from Euroleague basketball statistics.
